retry: We're having problems, please try again later

home.growth_info: Check how much our platform has grown last year.
home.newsletter_info: Follow on updates to news on the platform.
home.time: It's {time}, {day}, what will we do today?

news.news_1_subtitle: You can create bots with artificial inteligence and integrate them to your communication systems.
news.news_2_subtitle: In Flows you can create bots, manage conversation flows and set your custom contact settngs.
news.news_3_subtitle: Improve your bots in Artificial Inteligence and leave them ready to manage situations that would normally require human input.
news.news_4_subtitle: Interact with your clients or users in Agents with greater control with all your chats in one place.

account.profile_text: You can change your personal information, such as profile picture and username, or delete your account.
account.reset_confirm: Do you really wish to remove your profile picture? You can send another later.
account.delete_account_confirm: Do you really wish to delete your account? Any flows, intelligences and access to omnichannel will be lost and unrecoverable.
account.save_confirm: Do you wish to commit these changes?
account.password_confirm: Confirm this action entering your password

orgs.orgs_description: To the side are the organizations in which you are a member. Choose one or create a new one to access the platform.
orgs.view_members_description: Identify the members that are in your organization
orgs.change_name_description: Change your org's name and description. Try to set it easy to be found by other members.
orgs.manage_members_description: Send and resend invitations, or remove members from your organization
orgs.delete_confirm: Do you really wish to delete organization ‚Äú{org}‚Äù? All your data such as flows, artificial inteligence and access to agent channels will be lost and unsalvageable.
orgs.removed_member_success: {user} was removed from the organization and a warning email will be sent üòâ
orgs.save_success_text: Your org's name and description were changed, an email will be sent to the members üòâ
orgs.delete_confirmation_text: The organization {name} was deleted, an e-mail will be sent to the members. üòâ
orgs.remove_member_description: Are you sure you want to remove {user} from {org}?
orgs.leave_description: Are you sure you want to leave the organization? If you are an admin, ownership will be transfered to the next highest ranking member. If you are alone in the organization, it will be removed and unrecoverable.

create.title: You may take this moment to invite members to your organizations, if desired.
create.org_name_placeholder: Define the name of your organization
create.org_user_email_placeholder: Enter an e-mail to send an invite
create.project_name_placeholder: Enter a name that is easy to understand
create.finish_text: Organization and Project successfully created, you can now access the platform üòâ
create.no_permission: You have not added any members to your organization. Only you will be a part of it. Proceed anyway?
create.no_permission_title: Proceed without new members in your organization?
